availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lebanon, Kentucky, soldier. Sergeant in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from July 27, 1861, to October 28, 1863. Captain in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from October 28, 1863, to January 10, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 12-13, 361.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 928.
